name: Chadley Chadwick Chadington: Master Thief
description:
Made in 14 days for #LOWRESJAM 2018 by @PkBiggums & @Shayzen_AG

Sneak your way through 3 levels and loot everything that's not nailed down!

Controls:

Z - Jump

X - Pickup/throw items

C(hold) - move camera

Arrow keys - move

Up arrow - enter doors
